feature: Create content strategy documentation linking docs/ to website sections
description: Create documentation that maps the docs/ folder content to the live website sections, clarifying content versions, their relationships, and which content is current/authoritative.

phases.name: Research & Analysis
phases.description: Analyze existing content in docs/ and index.html to understand the current state and relationships

subtasks.title: Analyze docs/abe-diaz-profile.md content structure
subtasks.description: Document all sections in abe-diaz-profile.md including Identity, Professional Summary, Impact & Achievements, Work Experience, Education, Skills, Open Source, Volunteering, Press & Publications, Personal, and Social Links

subtasks.title: Analyze index.html content sections
subtasks.description: Document all content sections in the live website including About Me, profile image, bio text, likes, flight stats, and contact section

subtasks.title: Create content mapping between docs/ and website
subtasks.description: Identify which parts of abe-diaz-profile.md are used in index.html, which are unused, and document any discrepancies in information between sources

subtasks.title: Create docs/CONTENT-STRATEGY.md
subtasks.description: Create the main content strategy document with sections for: Overview, Content Sources, Version History, Website Section Mapping, and Maintenance Guidelines

subtasks.title: Document content source of truth
subtasks.description: Clearly document that abe-diaz-profile.md is the authoritative source for profile information and how it relates to index.html content

subtasks.title: Create website section-to-docs mapping table
subtasks.description: Create a detailed mapping table showing each website section and its corresponding source in docs/, including any content that exists in docs but not on the website

subtasks.title: Document content update workflow
subtasks.description: Add guidelines for how to update content: whether to update docs first, website first, or keep them in sync, and best practices for maintaining consistency

phases.name: Validation & Cleanup
phases.description: Review, validate, and finalize the documentation

subtasks.title: Review documentation for accuracy
subtasks.description: Verify all mappings are correct, all sections are documented, and the content strategy is clear and actionable

subtasks.title: Update build-progress.txt with completion notes
subtasks.description: Document what was created, key findings about content relationships, and any recommendations for future content management

final_acceptance: Document clearly identifies source of truth for content
Website section-to-docs mapping table is complete
